segments.text: Excuse me , can you help me figure out how to get to the Wudaokou subway station from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ... first you're going to have to buy a ticket to ride on the subway . The Wudaokou station is on the lightrail , so you'll have to transfer . Be sure you buy a combination ticket for the regular subway and the lightrail . It should cost you 5 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An after I buy the ticket , where should I go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take the red line train from here , but you'll have to transfer to the blue line at Fuxingmen transfer station . After you transfer , take the blue line that is heading north towards Fuchengmen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I transfer from red to blue , then how long do I ride the blue ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll take the blue line until you reach Xizhimen . That's a big station , so there will likely be a lot of people getting off at that stop . You can transfer to the lightrail there , you'll have to exit the subway and present the unused portion of your combination ticket to the Ticketmaster , they'll give you a new ticket to use on the lightrail system .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not the really , don't worry about it , like I said there'll be a lot of people there doing the same thing that you are doing , so just follow the crowd , There's only one direction to go , so you won't get on the wrong train . Head north on the Yellow line , and you'll see Wudaokou in just a couple of stops .
segments.speaker: S2
